task.title: How to Get to Shanks Hall from Campus
task.shortdesc: Even when you're familiar with the Virginia Tech Campus, Shanks is a difficult place to find!

context.p: Getting to Shanks Hall from Burruss Hall will take about 8 minutes.

step.cmd: Walk northeast on Drillfield Drive toward Stanger Street.
Cross Stanger Street at the crosswalk across from McBryde Hall.
Turn left and follow the sidewalk past the Liberal Arts Building.
Turn right once you have passed Major Williams.
Follow the sidewalk and turn left. Shanks Hall will be before you.
Walk to the front door and enter.
